How to obtain 3 more oak logs in Minecra: Answer: You can obtain 3 more oak logs in Minecraft by finding and chopping down an oak tree. Oak trees can be found in most biomes in the game. Use an axe to chop down the tree and it will drop oak logs.
How to craft a crafting table in Minecra: Answer: To craft a crafting table in Minecraft, you need four wooden planks. Arrange the planks in a square shape in the crafting grid to create a crafting table. Once crafted, you can use the crafting table to create more complex items and tools.
How to craft a wooden pickaxe in Minecra: Answer: To craft a wooden pickaxe in Minecraft, you will need three wooden planks and two sticks. How to mine 3 coals in Minecraft?: Answer: To mine 3 coals in Minecraft, you will need to find a coal vein that has at least 3 coal blocks. How to craft a stone pickaxe in Minecraf: Answer: To craft a stone pickaxe in Minecraft, you will need three pieces of cobblestone and two sticks. How to kill 1 chicken in Minecraft?: Answer: You can kill a chicken in Minecraft by attacking it with your hand or any tool, such as a sword or an axe. One hit should be enough to kill a chicken.
